nodes.text: The Pho family was the family alias used by Jedi Knight Jai Maruk, Padawans Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy and Whie Malreaux while they were aboard the commercial freighter Reasonable Doubt on their way to the planet Vjun. They were accompanied by Grand Master Yoda, who was disguised as an astromech droid, and Jedi Knight Maks Leem claimed to be a friend.
The team could not keep their cover for long; when the Phindar Spaceport came under attack by Separatist commander Asajj Ventress, they exposed their Jedi nature to defend civilians.
